name: Hand Spinner - 3D Throw Game
description:
Get ready for a great Can Knockdown game experience with a 3D fidget hand spinner! Choose your 3d hand spinner, twist as quickly as possible and knock the cans down. But be careful with the radioactive yellow cans, you are to avoid hitting those or you fail the mission!
How to play?
• Different levels in 3D location
• Choose your hand spinner
• Flick the cans knockdown with fast spins
• Avoid hitting the radioactive yellow tins
• Challenge your friends, play with them spin and knock down the cans together!
• Easy-to-use controls and user friendly gameplay
• 3D graphic effects, visual effects and original music
If you like our app, please rate and comment to help us improve!
